meta_description: Lawndale is a multidisciplinary contemporary art center that engages Houston communities with exhibitions and programs that explore the aesthetic, critical, and social issues of our time.
hours_text:
# Visit

#### Lawndale

4912 Main St, Houston, TX 77002, USA

Free parking is available behind the building at the corner of Travis and Rosedale.  
The entrance is located right off the main parking lot behind the building.

[Get Directions](http://web.archive.org/web/20251016132113/https://goo.gl/maps/2RE5eqR9dP52)

Lawndale is located within the Houston Museum District and the Midtown Cultural Arts and Entertainment District at the corner of Main and Rosedale streets.

## Admission & Hours

Admission to Lawndale is always free.

Galleries are open Wednesday – Saturday from 11 AM – 5 PM. [Click here](http://web.archive.org/web/20251016132113/https://lawndaleartcenter.org/exhibitions/on-view/) to learn more about the exhibitions on view.

We welcome current Friends of Lawndale to book a **Library appointment** throughout the week (Monday – Friday from 11 AM – 4 PM) to view the [Lawndale Lending Library](http://web.archive.org/web/20251016132113/https://lawndaleartcenter.org/support/lawndale-lending-library/), our arts lending library featuring the work of Houston and Gulf Coast area artists. For more information about **Friends of Lawndale** , [click here](http://web.archive.org/web/20251016132113/https://lawndaleartcenter.org/support/friends-of-lawndale/) or contact Emily Fens at [[email protected]](/web/20251016132113/https://lawndaleartcenter.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#234645464d50634f42544d47424f4642515740464d5746510d4c5144).

## Gallery Hours:
